mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_comment (member_uid, board_uid, comment_content,) VALUES (#{member_uid}, #{board_uid}, #{comment_content})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_uid, board_uid, member_uid, comment_content AS content FROM mc_comment WHERE comment_uid = #{uid}
